alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms and a gusty outflow will impact portions of northern Brevard and southeastern Volusia Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 258 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bethune Beach to near Klondike Beach to Merritt Island. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Rockledge, New Smyrna Beach, Edgewater, and Cocoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
